config_module_not_found_warning:
Configuration module (zemosaic_config.py) not found.
ASTAP paths will not be saved between sessions.
astap_exe_not_set_warning: ASTAP executable path is not set.
astap_data_dir_not_set_warning: ASTAP data directory path is not set.
processing_already_running_warning: A process is already running. Please wait.
worker_module_unavailable_error:
Worker module (zemosaic_worker.py) is not available or incomplete.
Cannot start processing.
processing_finished_log_key: Processing finished or worker thread stopped.
msg_processing_completed_errors: Processing completed with errors. Please check logs.
q_open_output_folder_msg: Do you want to open the output folder '{folder}'?
q_quit_while_processing_msg:
Processing is currently in progress.
Quitting now might interrupt the process abruptly.

Are you sure you want to quit?
worker_module_missing_critical_error:
Worker module (zemosaic_worker.py) not found or import error.
ZeMosaic cannot start its main functionalities.

Please check console logs for import error details and ensure all dependencies (Astropy, Reproject, etc.) are installed.
